cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Unique wooden bunk beds with privacy curtain, USB charging station, reading light and lockable storage.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Dorm room with 4 unique NZ timber bunks. Each bunk comes with a personal power socket, night light, storage area and privacy curtain.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Economy Twin Room allows you to have a privacy and comfort on a budget! Each room has two single beds, hotel-quality mattresses, full linen and inclusive fluffy bath towels.  You also have full access to our fully equipped kitchens and lounge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
